post.title: 50" pioneer kuro pdp-5010fd or panny th-50pz850u, best choice?
post.content: all, assuming both are the same price... which would you choose? does either of the two do better with screen reflection/glare or ir/burn-in. those are my only two concerns right now. let me know. we currently have a panny 42" 60u in the basement and love it. looking for a step up in the living room from our 52" jvc dila. mike
